title: Snow halation
center: Honoka Kosaka Kozue Otomune ([[Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club
description: Snow halation is μ’s second single as well as the ending theme for Love Live! School idol project Season 2 Episode 9. It was released on December 22, 2010 on both CD and DVD in order to celebrate the upcoming Christmas Day. It is also included in all of μ's solo albums and μ's Best Album Best Live! Collection.
